2035.title: Ghadan Naltaqi
2035.description:
Abdel Min'em Amayri 
Asylum seekers set their flight from the strife in Syria & head to Beirut. They settle down in a saggy building amidst harsh circumstances that require more than just a safe place.
2035.subtitle: 1 Season - 30 Episodes

2036.title: Habbet Ramel
2036.description: Set in Abu Dhabi in the year 1960, this show tells the story of an elderly father (played by Bilal Abdullah) who after the death of his eldest son seeks out his youngest son (played by Abdulla Zeid) and asks of him to return from Kuwait to marry the diseased brother's two widows, Raziqa Al Taresh and Huda Al Ghanem, in order to keep the family together.
2036.subtitle: 1 Season - 27 Episodes

2037.title: Haresh Wa Waresh
2037.description:
Hasan Al-Ballam, Abd Al-Naser Darwish
Haresh & Waresh start a quest to elevate their small neighbourhood as aspired by its people. The duo subject their hometown & its dwellers to a series of mishaps.
2037.subtitle: 1 Season - 30 Episodes

2211.title: Bakery Boss
2211.description: The world knows him as the CAKE BOSS, but Buddy Valastro isnt just a master baker.  Hes also a successful businessman who has turned his familys business into one of the most famous bakeries in the country! But too many family owned bakeries across the country are floundering instead of flourishing. Thats where the expertise of the BAKERY BOSS comes into play, as Buddy hits the road to turn these struggling bakeries around! Follow Buddy as he turns lackluster storefronts into eye candy and brings life to boring menus.  But in family businesses, personality problems can be the biggest detriment to success which means Buddy has to cook up some good old fashioned family sit downs in order to turn these run down shops, into dough making machines!
2211.subtitle: 1 Season - 13 Episodes

2232.title: Dubai Lynx 2016
2232.description: The Dubai Lynx International Festival of Creativity is the region's annual must-attend event for the advertising and communications industries. The Dubai Lynx Awards honour the regions best work in advertising.
2232.subtitle: 1 Season - 17 Episodes

3931.title: VR with Happy Finish
3931.subtitle: Season 2016 - Episode 1
3931.description:
2016 is being hailed as The Year for VR. Happy Finish have created VR experiences for many world leading brands including Walmart, Samsung/ Rihanna, Honeywell, AB InBev and Subway. TED Speaker, Simon Gosling, Creative Evangelist at Happy Finish, will discuss the creative process of making these experiences, and the ROI benefits that their clients have enjoyed as a result. 

In addition, when VR first came back to prominence, we saw a lot of rollercoaster rides and thrill based experiences. Whilst these are great fun at first, the novelty soon wears off. Simon explores the maturing of storytelling in VR and how brands are now using it to engage consumers in more immersive ways then ever before.

3932.title: Secret weapons to truly understanding People- Indian Aunties
3932.subtitle: Season 2016 - Episode 2
3932.description:
Yeah weve all got frameworks. Weve all got tools. Weve all got data. And weve all got a number cruncher that can make sense of all those numbers. So what?

What next? What now? What do we do with this digital data special-sauce that was supposed to make us human insight experts? 

Well, weve got to actually do something meaningful with it. From my observation of experts at turning data into magic, no one has proven to be better than typical Indian Aunties.

What we can learn from these master knowledge banks, spontaneous networkers and story weavers, complements our data arsenals into the base for more meaningful and valuable brand narratives that people will want to engage with.

Inspired by that approach, weve developed the Peopletalk collaboration platform at Leo Burnett MENA, as a means for insight mining and innovation that leverages shared perspective in shaping where brands are headed.

Come hear about how every organization needs to hire my Aunty not only for her great curries, but for much more than that.

3933.title: Mena's Got Talent
3933.subtitle: Season 2016 - Episode 3
3933.description:
With 1,240 applications made and 92 new Guinness World Records title holders awarded in 2015, MENA has become one of the fastest growing regions for Guinness World Records title holders in the world.

Guinness World Records SVP EMEA & APAC Nadine Causey explains what inspires companies and individuals in the region to join this esteemed record-breaking family; shares case studies on how local companies have used record breaking to launch products, foster better employee engagement and provide unforgettable record-breaking experiences for customers; and offers some tips on how to make your campaign or organisation Officially Amazing.

2251.title: Jdeed Al Social Media
2251.description: "Jdeed Al Social Media" is a show that shares with you what's trending on social media in the middle east and the whole world.
2251.subtitle: 1 Season - 12 Episodes

4029.title: Obama & the 106-year-old
4029.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 6
4029.description: The 6th episode of "New on Social Media" talks about President Obama making a dream come true to a 106-year-old, the Arabic movies in Berlin International Film Festival and how Twitter users reacted to the hashtag "Describe your country in one word".

4030.title: How Arabs celebrated Valentine's day
4030.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 5
4030.description: In the fifth episode the Arab world reacts to Valentine's, strange boxes follow people in Switzerland and Ahlam shares a tweet which everyone finds funny.

4031.title: Sisi's car
4031.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 4
4031.description: This episode will take you all the way to Poland where two sisters open a salon especially for cancer patients, then back to Egypt where everyone is criticizing the president for driving on a red carpet.

4032.title: Messi & Tamer Hosny
4032.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 3
4032.description: Messi is looking for his young fan in the third episode of "New On Social Media", but Tamer Hosney is running away from his fans!

4033.title: Haifa Wehbe's shoes
4033.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 2
4033.description: In the second episode of "New On Social Media", get to know what's the story behind the hashtag #Dstorng , how Haifa Wehbe's shoes fell off on stage and how the Islamic preacher - Ali AlMalki - fires up Twitter.

4044.title: Be Like Bill
4044.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 1
4044.description: The first episode of Jdeed Al Social Media talks about the Hashtag #BeLikeBill which everyone is sharing on Social Media, the story behind Saber Rebas incident in Sharjah World Music Festival & the womens revolution against men on Twitter!

4065.title: Palestinian teacher wins global prize
4065.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 8
4065.description: The eighth episode talks about the Palestinian teacher who won $1 million Global Teacher Prize in Dubai & Bernie Sanders' suit that confused the people.

4066.title: Surprising News
4066.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 7
4066.description: Social Media exploded when Leonardo won the Oscar for the best actor in his role in The Revenant, and on the other side of the world people are talking about Shireen's retirement decision which shocked the media.

4106.title: Lebanon Vs. Ahlam
4106.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 10
4106.description: On Twitter, #____, or ban Ahlam from entering Lebanon has been trending, after some offensive tweets by the Emirati celebrity. On the other hand, Photoshop was the reason one girl went trending on social media.

4107.title: The Syrian Refugee
4107.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 9
4107.description: The ninth episode sheds light on the Syrian refugee who has been stuck in a Turkish airport for a year,  and talks about the smart marketing idea that encouraged people to donate.

4279.title: Mourinho to Syria ?
4279.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 11
4279.description: The 11th episode highlights the waves of anger that surrounded Najwa Karam after her comments about the women's role in life in addition to highlighting Syria's proposal to sign Mourinho to coach the football team.

5209.title: Prince Tributes
5209.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 14
5209.description: Social media explodes as Prince tributes mark death of music icon. #TrustMeChallenge is one challenge that goes bad in the US, and people react to the death of a Sryain child, "Jamal AlAshqar."

2291.title: Al Ghorbal
2291.description: This series takes place in 1927 in a famous neighborhood in Damascus, during the period of the French Mandate. The story covers the murder of Salim, the son of a local leader, and the attempt to uncover the truth about his death.

5127.title: Al Arrab - Season 02
5127.subtitle: Season 2 - Episode 8
5127.description: "After the murder of Abu Alia, his sons Qaisar and Jad take a decision not to pursue their father's murderer in order to maintain their influence and position in the market that has been infiltrated by new companies and families. rnThe sons conduct business using different methods than their own dad, they start by cleaning their own house, especially after the discovery of several large breaches from their own partners and in specific from their partners in Beirut that have been working closely with their father for several years with no apparent problems. Joseph their agent pays the price which came as a message to the rest that they haven't weakened, but on the contrary they are about to reclaim the throne that their father had in the world of money, mafia and power."

5370.description: "After the murder of Abu Alia, his sons Qaisar and Jad take a decision not to pursue their father's murderer in order to maintain their influence and position in the market that has been infiltrated by new companies and families. rnThe sons conduct business using different methods than their own dad, they start by cleaning their own house, especially after the discovery of several large breaches from their own partners and in specific from their partners in Beirut that have been working closely with their father for several years with no apparent problems. Joseph their agent pays the price which came as a message to the rest that they haven't weakened, but on the contrary they are about to reclaim the throne that their father had in the world of money, mafia and power."

2358.title: Waad Al Ghareeb
2358.description: Zaid is a knight who was accused of not participating in the battles of his tribe and therefore he leaves his folks and since then is called; Alsharood (The escaper.) He falls in love with Fazwa, a daughter of a well-known knight, when he saves her from another tribe's captivity. However, this love story won't see the light because Zain travels again and leaves the tribe on his wedding night.
2358.subtitle: 1 Season - 17 Episodes

2361.title: Duroob
2361.description: A show with a cultural message based on excitememnt and adventure. Every day, Ali Al Saloom being the cultures and tourism expert in the region visits a country or sheds the light on a social phenomenon to present a unique story that connects people together to inspire communities to change for the better with no race or religion or cultural bias.
2361.subtitle: 1 Season - 15 Episodes

2362.title: Eshhafan
2362.description: Sarcastic stories about Eshhafan Alqatu and details about his life and personality of being stingy. His love for money and his greed have became a symbol of scrimp. He doesn't want to change regardless of the changes that are happening around him, he still lives in an old house. His worst enemies Makdait and Alkarani always try to put him in situations to force him to change. WIll he?
2362.subtitle: 1 Season - 15 Episodes

2363.title: Aonak
2363.description: A program that captures all the good will that the Emirates Red Crescent has provided by following all of its initiatives that has spread this countrys good deeds throughout the world and has achieved great successes. "Aonak" will be an open book showcasing the efforts to provide happiness to others and the values of sacrifice and deep lessons about the importance of supporting your fellow humans in times of need.
2363.subtitle: 1 Season - 15 Episodes

2364.title: 7 Arwah
2364.description: Officer Motaz submits his resignation after he completes an investigation in a large case that drew the death sentence to the businessmen Mohammed Syoufi who was accused with the murder of his lover Hala Tarek. As Motaz was planning his future his life takes a turn to the worse when Hala starts to appear in his life repeatedly convincing him to save Mohammed. However she tended to disappear right after she appeared making Motaz seem delusional even mad at times. Things became even worse when Mohammed escapes prison and Motaz finds him dead under his bed making him the number one suspect in Mohammed's murder.
2364.subtitle: 1 Season - 16 Episodes

2365.title: Sarareed Khulood
2365.description: The program brings to your home the most delicious dishes from UAE, the gulf, Arab World and internationally, in addition to introducing different dining etiquette for presenting and serving the food in special occasions and holidays. There is also a segment for creativity where the chef provides various ways of how we can re-use the things around the house to decorate your table or to store your food for later. In this season, a review of some proper health habits and some nutritional information to some unique cultures.
2365.subtitle: 1 Season - 17 Episodes

5165.title: Sarareed Khuloud
5165.subtitle: Season 5 - Episode 1
5165.description: The program highlights all the delicious UAE, Gulf, Arab and international dishes, in addition to the definition of the etiquette in presenting and displaying the food on the special occasions and holidays. There will be a creative segment that provides various ways of how we can re-use the things in the house to decorate the table or to save the food. In this season, a review of some proper health habits and some nutritional information to some unique peoples.

There is also a segment for creativity where the chef provides various ways of how we can re-use the things around the house to decorate your table or to store your food for later. In this season, a review of some proper health habits and some nutritional information to some unique cultures.

2419.title: Tawq Al Isflit
2419.description: The series takes place in rural Jordan after a tribal sheikh named Mizal has an accident and falls from his horses saddle.This incident weakens his influence over his tribe and other tribes in the region.Meanwhile, there is a project underway to extend roads into the tribal areas, encroaching on their way of life

5086.description: The series takes place in rural Jordan after a tribal sheikh named Mizal has an accident and falls from his horses saddle.This incident weakens his influence over his tribe and other tribes in the region.Meanwhile, there is a project underway to extend roads into the tribal areas, encroaching on their way of life

2420.title: Hareem Abouy
2420.description: The story about four wives married to one man living in the same house, until he disappeared suddenly and mysteriously, the four women on work on raising children and they are 11 in the same home in an atmosphere of comedy mixed with drama.
2420.subtitle: 1 Season - 30 Episodes

2448.title: Ood Akhdar
2448.description: The story revolves around Hanin, who lost her mother when she was only 7 years old. She now suffers from loneliness and lacks confidence from everybody around her especially after her father remarries.
2448.subtitle: 1 Season - 16 Episodes

2449.title: Azmat Naseb
2449.description: Hanan a beautiful young nurse living in a humble neighbourhood meets Sharif, a wealthy young man during a visit he was making with his wife Samar, in their attempt to conceive. Hanan and Sharif fall in love, and marry in secret. Sharif's father and uncle force him to divorce her as they see her coming from a lower class of society. Tragedy occurs when Sharif passes away, and Hanan enters the family declaring she is now a widow and baring his child.
2449.subtitle: 1 Season - 16 Episodes

2450.title: Hareem Bu Sultan
2450.description: Bu Sultan is told by his mother to get married. He listens to her and marries not one but three women, each with a different problems and past. He faces strange situations with them along with the problems with the company he works at.
2450.subtitle: 1 Season - 16 Episodes

5189.description: Bu Sultan is told by his mother to get married. He listens to her and marries not one but three women, each with a different problems and past. He faces strange situations with them along with the problems with the company he works at.

2458.title: Grand Hotel
2458.description: The Grand Hotel is an exciting world filled with secrets and tales, told through the lives of different society members regardless of their class in the 50s. The wealthy and rich reside in the hotel, whilst the servants and businessmen each do their part as they tell the story. Ali decides to visit his sister that works at the Hotel, to his surprise she had left before he arrived. Doubt fills his heart as he asks the people around about her, but he doesn't get a straight answer. As he struggles to find out what happened to his sister, he falls in love with Nazly, the daughter of the hotel's owner. However Nazly's mother will not allow her to marry the brother of a servant, but tries to make her marry her cousin Morad, to save the family from bankruptcy.
2458.subtitle: 1 Season - 16 Episodes

2473.title: Soapbox
2473.description: Soapbox is a showcase for people who create. It gives voice to a group of people who call Dubai home, and want to leave their mark on it. They may do it through art, music, motorcycles, pottery, poetry. No matter what it is that they do, the city wouldnt be the same without them.
2473.subtitle: 1 Season - 3 Episodes

5071.title: Soapbox - Abbo
5071.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 1
5071.description: Abbo is a Dubai-based singer/songwriter who has almost single-handedly created the open-mic scene in the city.

5072.title: Soapbox - Marco Mller
5072.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 2
5072.description: Marco Mller is a Dubai-based motorcycle builder. He left his day job to set up mto - a custom bike shop in Dubai. This is his story

5297.title: Soapbox - Basil Azizoghly
5297.subtitle: Season 1 - Episode 3
5297.description: Basil Azizoghly left his job to set up Howlin' Rooster Guitars & Such - where he turns just about anything into a musical instrument

5224.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5224.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 1
5224.description: In this episode, Marwa surprises a random patient in one of the hospitals in Abu Dhabi with a bouquet of flowers.

5225.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5225.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 2
5225.description: In this episode, Marwa focuses on the happiness of the younger generation. She, therefore surprises the children with little gifts in one of the malls in Abu Dhabi.

5291.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5291.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 3
5291.description: It is the third day of Ramadan, therefore, Marwa starts her day by ticking off another deed from her list. She roams around the old streets of Abu Dhabi distributing little tokens of gratitude.

5330.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5330.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 5
5330.description: In this episode, our deed succeeded to draw a smile on the faces of some random shoppers in a grocery shop.

5331.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5331.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 4
5331.description: In this initiative, mobile recharge cards were distributed on exapts around Abu Dhabi to enable them to get in touch with their families overseas.

5339.title: 30 Deeds 30 Days
5339.subtitle: Ramadan 2016 - Episode 8
5339.description: In this episode, our initiative does not require any financial expenditure.
